debates.showAs: National Anthem Bill 2019: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to confirm that the choral refrain, with or without the lyrics, of  "Amhrán na bhFiann" or, in the English Language, "The Soldier's Song" is and continues to be the National Anthem; to provide for a version of the National Anthem in the Irish Sign Language;  to confirm that the Presidential Salute is and continues to be the music of the first 4 bars, followed by the last 4 bars, of the National Anthem; and to provide for other related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhaingniú gurb é an loinneog chórúil "Amhrán na bhFiann" nó, sa Bhéarla, "The Soldier's Song", leis na liricí nó gan iad, an Rosc Náisiúnta agus go leanann sé de bheith mar an Rosc Náisiúnta; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le leagan den Rosc Náisiúnta i dTeanga Chomharthaíochta na hÉireann; do dhaingniú gurb é ceol na chéad 4 bharra den Rosc Náisiúnta agus ceol na 4 bharra deiridh de ina dhiaidh Cúirtéis an Uachtaráin agus go leanann sé de bheith mar Chúirtéis an Uachtaráin; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara eile.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um an Rosc Náisiúnta, 2019

debates.showAs: Declaration of Independence Day Bill 2017: Report and Final Stages
Declaration of Independence Day Bill 2017: Committee Stage
Declaration of Independence Day Bill 2017: Second Stage
Declaration of Independence Day Bill 2017: Second Stage (Resumed)
Declaration of Independence Day Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to recognise the meeting of the First Dáil and the Declaration of Independence made on 21 January 1919 and to provide for a "Declaration of Independence Day" to be held on 21 January annually and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht d'aithint thionól na Chéad Dála agus na Faisnéise Neamhspleáchais a rinneadh an 21 Eanáir 1919 agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir le "Lá na Faisnéise Neamhspleáchais" a thionólfar an 21 Eanáir gach bliain agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Lá na Faisnéise Neamhspleáchais 2017

debates.showAs: Critical Health Professionals Bill 2017: Second Stage
Critical Health Professionals Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to ensure that critical health professionals who are employees of all organisations funded directly by the Department of Health, all organisations funded by the Health Service Executive, all organisations funded under section 38 of the Health Act 2004, and all other health and disability service providers, may, if they wish, postpone their retirement where they would otherwise have been forced to retire at a particular age that is stipulated in their employment contract, subject to dual consent being in place between the employee and the employer, and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht dá chinntiú go bhféadfaidh gairmithe sláinte criticiúla ar fostaithe iad de chuid na n-eagraíochtaí go léir atá maoinithe go díreach ag an Roinn Sláinte, de chuid na n-eagraíochtaí go léir atá maoinithe ag Feidhmeannacht na Seirbhíse Sláinte, de chuid na n-eagraíochtaí go léir atá maoinithe faoi alt 38 den Acht Sláinte, 2004, agus de chuid gach soláthraí seirbhíse eile sláinte agus míchumais, más mian leo é, an scor a iarchur i gcás go gcuirfí iallach orthu thairis sin dul ar scor ag aois áirithe atá sonraithe ina gconradh fostaíochta, faoi réir toiliú déthaobhach a bheith ann idir an fostaí agus an fostóir, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Ghairmithe Sláinte Criticiúla, 2017

act.longTitleEn: Act to provide for the recognition of Irish Sign Language and for that purpose to set down principles to guide the operations of public bodies; to require public bodies to prepare and implement action plans on Irish Sign Language; to provide for classes for the parents of deaf children; to permit the use of Irish Sign Language in legal proceedings; to provide for the making available of sign language interpreting services; to introduce statutory targets regarding the accessibility of television programming; to provide for the regulation of Irish Sign Language interpreters, deaf interpreters and Irish Sign Language teachers and for that purpose to establish the Irish Sign Language Council; to provide for the establishment of registers; to provide for continuing education requirements; to provide for offences; to amend the Broadcasting Act 2009; and to provide for related matters
act.longTitleGa: Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le haitheantas a thabhairt do Theanga Chomharthaíochta na hÉireann agus chun na críche sin do leagan síos prionsabal chun oibríochtaí comhlachtaí poiblí a threorú; dá cheangal ar chomhlachtaí poiblí pleananna gníomhaíochta ar Theanga Chomharthaíochta na hÉireann a ullmhú agus a chur i ngníomh; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le ranganna do thuismitheoirí leanaí bodhra; do cheadú Teanga Chomharthaíochta na hÉireann a úsáid in imeachtaí dlí; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le seirbhísí ateangaireachta teanga comharthaíochta a chur ar fáil; do thabhairt isteach spriocanna reachtúla maidir le hinrochtaineacht ar chláir theilifíse; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le rialáil a dhéanamh ar ateangairí Theanga Chomharthaíochta na hÉireann, ar ateangairí do na bodhair agus ar mhúinteoirí Theanga Chomharthaíochta na hÉireann agus chun na críche sin do bhunú na Comhairle um Theanga Chomharthaíochta na hÉireann; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cláir a bhunú; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le riachtanais leantacha oideachais; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cionta; do leasú an Achta Craolacháin, 2009; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
act.shortTitleGa: An tAcht um Theanga Chomharthaíochta na hÉireann, 2017

amendmentList.showAs: Cream List [Dáil amendments to Seanad Bill]

debates.showAs: Irish Sign Language Bill 2016: [Seanad Bill amended by the Dáil] Report and Final Stages
Recognition of Irish Sign Language for the Deaf Community Bill 2016 [Seanad]: Second Stage
Recognition of Irish Sign Language for the Deaf Community Bill 2016 [Seanad]: Committee and Remaining Stages
Recognition of Irish Sign Language for the Deaf Community Bill 2016: Report and Final Stages
Recognition of Irish Sign Language for the Deaf Community Bill 2016: Committee Stage
Recognition of Irish Sign Language for the Deaf Community Bill 2016: Second Stage
Recognition of Irish Sign Language for the Deaf Community Bill 2016: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the recognition of Irish Sign Language and for that purpose to set down principles to guide the operations of public bodies; to require public bodies to prepare and implement action plans on Irish Sign Language; to provide for classes for the parents of deaf children; to permit the use of Irish Sign Language in legal proceedings; to provide for the making available of sign language interpreting services; to introduce statutory targets regarding the accessibility of television programming; to provide for the regulation of Irish Sign Language interpreters, deaf interpreters and Irish Sign Language teachers and for that purpose to establish the Irish Sign Language Council; to provide for the establishment of registers; to provide for continuing education requirements; to provide for offences; to amend the Broadcasting Act 2009; and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le haitheantas a thabhairt do Theanga Chomharthaíochta na hÉireann agus chun na críche sin do leagan síos prionsabal chun oibríochtaí comhlachtaí poiblí a threorú; dá cheangal ar chomhlachtaí poiblí pleananna gníomhaíochta ar Theanga Chomharthaíochta na hÉireann a ullmhú agus a chur i ngníomh; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le ranganna do thuismitheoirí leanaí bodhra; do cheadú Teanga Chomharthaíochta na hÉireann a úsáid in imeachtaí dlí; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le seirbhísí ateangaireachta teanga comharthaíochta a chur ar fáil; do thabhairt isteach spriocanna reachtúla maidir le hinrochtaineacht ar chláir theilifíse; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le rialáil a dhéanamh ar ateangairí Theanga Chomharthaíochta na hÉireann, ar ateangairí do na bodhair agus ar mhúinteoirí Theanga Chomharthaíochta na hÉireann agus chun na críche sin do bhunú na Comhairle um Theanga Chomharthaíochta na hÉireann; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cláir a bhunú; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le riachtanais leantacha oideachais; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cionta; do leasú an Achta Craolacháin, 2009; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Theanga Chomharthaíochta na hÉireann 2016

debates.showAs: Corporate Manslaughter (No. 2) Bill 2016: Second Stage
Corporate Manslaughter (No. 2) Bill 2016: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to create the indictable offence of corporate manslaughter by an undertaking, to create the indictable offence of grossly negligent management causing death by a high managerial agent of the undertaking, and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do chruthú an chiona indíotáilte arb éard é dúnorgain chorparáideach ag gnóthas, do chruthú an chiona indíotáilte arb éard é bainistiú mórfhaillíoch ag gníomhaire is ardbhainisteoir de chuid an ghnóthais, ar bainistiú mórfhaillíoch é is cúis le bás, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara

debates.showAs: National Anthem Protection of Copyright and Related Rights (Amendment) (No. 2) Bill 2016: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to restore the national anthem copyright protection to the National Anthem of the State and for that purpose to amend the Copyright and Related Rights Act 2000 and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht chun cosaint cóipchirt an roisc náisiúnta a thabhairt ar ais do Rosc Náisiúnta an Stáit agus chun na críche sin do leasú an Achta Cóipchirt agus Ceart Gaolmhar, 2000 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleEn: National Anthem (Protection of Copyright and Related Rights) (Amendment) (No. 2) Bill 2016
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um an Rose Náisiúnta (Cóipcheart agus Cearta Gaolmhara a Chosaint) (Leasú) (Uimh. 2), 2016

debates.showAs: National Anthem (Protection of Copyright and Related Rights) (Amendment) Bill 2016: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to restore the national anthem copyright protection to the National Anthem of the State and for that purpose to amend the Copyright and Related Rights Act 2000 and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht chun cosaint cóipchirt an roisc náisiúnta a thabhairt ar ais do Rosc Náisiúnta an Stáit agus chun na críche sin do leasú an Achta Cóipchirt agus Ceart Gaolmhar, 2000 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleEn: National Anthem (Protection of Copyright and Related Rights) (Amendment) Bill 2016
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um an Rosc Náisiúnta (Cóipcheart agus Cearta Gaolmhara a Chosaint) (Leasú), 2016

debates.showAs: Public Health (Regulation of Electronic Cigarettes and Protection of Children) Bill 2015: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the prohibition of the consumption of electronic cigarettes in public service vehicles and places of work, to provide for the registration of persons engaged in the business of selling electronic cigarettes by retail, to provide for the prohibition on the advertising of electronic cigarettes, a prohibition on sponsorship by manufacturers and importers of electronic cigarettes and prohibitions on certain marketing practices in relation to electronic cigarettes, to provide for the standardised packaging of electronic cigarettes, to provide for the prohibition of the sale of electronic cigarettes to those under 18 years of age, to prohibit the consumption of electronic cigarettes in vehicles where persons under 18 years of age are present, to provide for the insertion of child proof caps on liquid nicotine bottles, and to provide for matters connected therewith
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú chun caitheamh toitíní leictreonacha i bhfeithiclí seirbhíse poiblí agus in ionaid oibre a thoirmeasc, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le clárú daoine a ghabhann do ghnó miondíola toitíní leictreonacha, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le toirmeasc ar fhógraíocht toitíní leictreonacha, maidir le toirmeasc ar choimircíocht ag monaróirí agus allmhaireoirí toitíní leictreonacha agus maidir le toirmisc ar chleachtais áirithe margaíochta i ndáil le toitíní leictreonacha, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le pacáistiú caighdeánaithe toitíní leictreonacha, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le díol toitíní leictreonacha le daoine faoi bhun 18 mbliana d'aois a thoirmeasc, do thoirmeasc caitheamh toitíní leictreonacha i bhfeithiclí ina bhfuil daoine faoi bhun 18 mbliana d'aois, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le caipín atá sábháilte do leanaí a chur ar bhuidéil ina bhfuil nicitín ina leacht, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe a bhaineann leis an méid sin
bill.shortTitleEn: Public Health (Regulation of Electronic Cigarettes and Protection of Children) Bill 2015
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Sláinte Poiblí (Toitíní Leictreonacha a Rialáil agus Leanaí a Chosaint), 2015

debates.showAs: Immigration Reform for U.S. Citizens Living in Ireland Bill 2014: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to facilitate reciprocity in the making available of employment permits for citizens of the United States of America and for that purpose to amend the Employment Permits act 2006 and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht d'éascú cómhalartaíochta le linn ceadanna fostaíochta a chur ar fáil do shaoránaigh de chuid Stáit Aontaithe Mheiriceá agus chun na críche sin do leasú an Achta um Cheadanna Fostaíochta, 2006 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleEn: Immigration Reform for U.S. Citizens Living in Ireland Bill 2014
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Athchóiriú Inimirce do Shaoránaigh de chuid S.A.M. a Chónaíonn in Éirinn, 2014

debates.showAs: Planning and Development (Temporary Moratorium) Bill 2014: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend and extend the Planning and Deveopment Act 2000; and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú agus do leathnú an Achta um Pleanáil agus Forbairt, 2000; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Pleanáil agus Forbairt (Moratóir Sealadach), 2014

debates.showAs: Defamation (Amendment) Bill 2014: Second Stage
Defamation (Amendment) Bill 2014: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for limiting the damages certain public bodies may receive in defamation actions so as to protect public discourse from public bodies using the resources of the State, and the powers granted to them by the Defamation Act 2009, to influence comment by the press and the public
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le teorainn a chur leis na damáistí a fhéadfaidh comhlachtaí poiblí áirithe a fháil i gcaingne clúmhillte d'fhonn an dioscúrsa poiblí a chosaint ar chomhlachtaí poiblí d'úsáid acmhainní an Stáit, agus na gcumhachtaí a thugtar dóibh leis an Acht um Chlúmhilleadh, 2009, chun tionchar a imirt ar thuairimí ón bpreas agus ón bpobal

debates.showAs: NAMA and Irish Bank Resolution Corporation Transparency Bill 2013: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide that, in the interests of transparency, all relevant details of loans, properties, or other assets offered for sale by or with the approval of NAMA or the Irish Bank Resolution Corporation be available to the public by means of publication on a website
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú, ar mhaithe le trédhearcacht, chun go mbeidh na mionsonraí iomchuí uile maidir le hiasachtaí, maoine nó sócmhainní eile a thairgtear lena ndíol ag GNBS, nó lena ceadú, nó ag Corparáid na hÉireann um Réiteach Bainc, nó lena ceadú, ar fáil don phobal trína bhfoilsiú ar shuíomh gréasáin
bill.shortTitleEn: NAMA and Irish Bank Resolution Corporation Transparency Bill 2013
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thrédhearcacht GNBS agus Chorparáid na hÉireann um Réiteach Bainc 2013

debates.showAs: Recognition of Irish Sign Language for the Deaf Community Bill 2013: Second Stage
Recognition of Irish Sign Language for the Deaf Community Bill 2013: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the recognition of Irish Sign Language and for that purpose to set down principles to guide the operations of public bodies; to require public bodies to prepare and implement action plans on Irish Sign Language; to provide for classes for the parents of deaf children; to permit the use of Irish Sign Language in legal proceedings; to provide for the making available of sign language interpreting services; to introduce statutory targets regarding the accessibility of television programming; to provide for the regulation of Irish Sign Language interpreters, deaf interpreters and Irish Sign Language teachers and for that purpose to establish the Irish Sign Language Council; to provide for the establishment of registers; to provide for continuing education requirements; to provide for offences; to amend the Broadcasting Act 2009; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le haitheantas a thabhairt do Theanga Chomharthaíochta na hÉireann agus chun na críche sin do leagan síos prionsabal chun oibríochtaí comhlachtaí poiblí a threorú; dá cheangal ar chomhlachtaí poiblí pleananna gníomhaíochta ar Theanga Chomharthaíochta na hÉireann a ullmhú agus a chur i ngníomh; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le ranganna do thuismitheoirí leanaí bodhra; do cheadú Teanga Chomharthaíochta na hÉireann a úsáid in imeachtaí dlí; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le seirbhísí ateangaireachta teanga comharthaíochta a chur ar fáil; do thabhairt isteach spriocanna reachtúla maidir le hinrochtaineacht ar chláir theilifíse; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le rialáil a dhéanamh ar ateangairí Theanga Chomharthaíochta na hÉireann, ar ateangairí do na bodhair agus ar mhúinteoirí Theanga Chomharthaíochta na hÉireann agus chun na críche sin do bhunú na Comhairle um Theanga Chomharthaíochta na hÉireann; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cláir a bhunú; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le riachtanais leantacha oideachais; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cionta; do leasú an Achta Craolacháin, 2009; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Recognition of Irish Sign Language for the Deaf Community Bill 2013
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Theanga Chomharthaíochta na hÉireann do na Bodhair a Aithint, 2013

debates.showAs: EU Scrutiny and Transparency in Government Bill 2013: Second Stage
EU Scrutiny and Transparency in Government Bill 2013: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to ensure scrutiny of EU Directives prior to the signature by the relevant Ministers and to ensure Statutory Instruments which are of public interest are debated by the Seanad prior to enactment
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le grinnscrúdú a dhéanamh ar Threoracha AE sula síneoidh na hAirí iomchuí iad agus dá chinntiú go ndéanfaidh an Seanad díospóireacht ar Ionstraimí Reachtúla ar díol spéise poiblí iad sula n-achtófar iad
bill.shortTitleEn: EU Scrutiny and Transparency in Government Bill 2013
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Ghrinnscrúdú AE agus um Thrédhearcacht sa Rialtas, 2013

act.longTitleEn: Act to amend the Public Health (Tobacco) Act 2002 in order to prohibit the smoking of tobacco products in vehicles where children are present and to provide for the investigation and prosecution of such offences by members of an Garda Síochána
act.longTitleGa: Acht do leasú an Achta Sláinte Poiblí (Tobac), 2002 d'fhonn toirmeasc a chur le caitheamh táirgí tobac i bhfeithiclí a bhfuil leanaí i láthair iontu agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir le comhaltaí den Gharda Síochána d'imscrúdú agus d'ionchúiseamh cionta den sórt sin
act.shortTitleEn: Protection of Children's Health (Tobacco Smoke in Mechanically Propelled Vehicles) Act  2014
act.shortTitleGa: An tAcht um Chosaint Sláinte Leanaí (Deatach Tobac i bhFeithiclí Inneallghluaiste), 2014

debates.showAs: Protection of Children's Health (Tobacco Smoke in Mechanically Propelled Vehicles) Bill 2012: Report and Final Stages

Protection of Children's Health from Tobacco Smoke Bill 2012: Report and Final Stages
Protection of Children's Health from Tobacco Smoke Bill 2012: Committee Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Public Health (Tobacco) Act 2002 in order to prohibit the smoking of tobacco products in vehicles where children are present and to provide for the investigation and prosecution of such offences by members of an Garda Síochána
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Sláinte Poiblí (Tobac), 2002 d'fhonn toirmeasc a chur le caitheamh táirgí tobac i bhfeithiclí a bhfuil leanaí i láthair iontu agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir le comhaltaí den Gharda Síochána d'imscrúdú agus d'ionchúiseamh cionta den sórt sin
bill.shortTitleEn: Protection of Children's Health (Tobacco Smoke in Mechanically Propelled Vehicles) Bill 2012

An tAcht um Chosaint Sláinte Leanaí (Deatach Tobac i bhFeithiclí Inneallghluaiste), 2014

bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do chruthú an chiona indíotáilte arb éard é dúnorgain chorparáideach ag gnóthas, do chruthú an chiona indíotáilte arb éard é bainistiú mórfhaillíoch is cúis le bás ag gníomhaire is ardbhainisteoir de chuid an ghnóthais, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide that, in the interests of transparency, all relevant details of loans, properties, or other assets offered for sale by or with the approval of NAMA or the Irish Bank Resolution Corporation be available to the public by means of publication on a website
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú, ar mhaithe le trédhearcacht, chun go mbeidh na mionsonraí iomchuí uile maidir le hiasachtaí, maoine nó sócmhainní eile a thairgtear lena ndíol ag GNBS, nó lena ceadú, nó ag Corparáid na hÉireann um Réiteach Bainc, nó lena ceadú, ar fáil don phobal trína bhfoilsiú ar shuíomh gréasáin

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide that a warning label shall be affixed to the exterior casing of mobile phones and on related packaging, which shall state clearly that mobile phones emit electromagnetic radiation
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú go ndéanfar lipéad rabhaidh a dhaingniú de chásáil sheachtrach guthán póca agus ar phacáistiú gaolmhar, ina ndéarfar go soiléir go n-astaíonn gutháin phóca radaíocht leictreamaighnéadach
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Rabhadh Radaíochta le haghaidh Guthán Póca, 2011

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide that a warning label shall be affixed to the exterior casing of mobile phones and on related packaging, which shall state clearly that mobile phones emit electromagnetic radiation
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú go ndéanfar lipéad rabhaidh a dhaingniú de chásáil sheachtrach guthán póca agus ar phacáistiú gaolmhar, ina ndéarfar go soiléir go n-astaíonn gutháin phóca radaíocht leictreamaighnéadach
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Rabhadh Radaíochta le haghaidh Guthán Póca 2010
